Class ModernScrollPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JScrollPane
            • view.comp.ModernScrollPane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.ScrollPaneConstants

    public class ModernScrollPane
extends javax.swing.JScrollPane
    This is an implementation of a JScrollPane with a modern UI
    Author:
    Philipp Danner
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
